import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.501e08ee:
blood_type=['AB','O','A','B']
number=[8,38,30,24]
fig=plt.figure()
ax=fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
ax.bar(blood_type,number)
plt.show()
source.ad6dec46:
fig1, ax1 = plt.subplots()

ax1.pie(number, labels=['AB','O','A','B'], radius=4.25, center=(5.5, 5.5),wedgeprops={"linewidth": 1, "edgecolor": "white"}, frame=True)

ax1.set(xlim=(0, 11), xticks=np.arange(1, 11),
       ylim=(0, 11), yticks=np.arange(1, 11))

plt.show()
source.086683bc:
fig2, ax2 = plt.subplots()

ax2.pie(number, labels=['AB','O','A','B'], wedgeprops={"linewidth": 1, "edgecolor": "white"}, shadow=True, colors=('firebrick','y','magenta','c'), autopct="%1.1f%%", )
ax2.legend()

plt.show()
source.94f0f04a:
x = [5,7,8,7,2,11,2,9,4,11,12,9,6]
y = [99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86]
fig3=plt.figure()
ax3=fig3.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
sizes = np.random.uniform(25, 80, len(x))
colors = np.random.uniform(25, 80, len(x))
ax3.scatter(x, y, s=sizes, c=colors, vmin=0, vmax=100)
ax3.set_title('Working Continuously Overtime',fontsize=25, color='r')
ax3.set_xlabel('Hours of working')
ax3.set_ylabel('Humans accuracy')
source.888abf6c:
data = np.random.normal(170,10,300)
fig4 = plt.figure()
ax=fig4.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
ax.hist(data, bins=10, linewidth=0.7, edgecolor="maroon")
